title: @RIOT. Regarding the Sheen changes. please respond.
body:
To say the least: not impressed.
this change hurts far more champions than it helps.

for example the 2 reasons you gave for removing the AP from it was:

a. its awkward to build from.

b. now 'some' champs wont have a wasted stat.


Starting with 'a. its awkward to build from' its build options haven't changed, if you were going to get tri force you're still going to build sheen with or without the changes, the same for iceborn gauntlet, infact all you did was make Lich bane REALLY awkward to build because now you have to fit in 3 build items instead of 2...

next 'b. now 'some' champs wont have a wasted stat' there are only 10 champions in the whole game out of 127 (soon 128) that dont use ability power and therefore it is a wasted stat on them. Just doing the maths shows that you have disadvantaged far more champions than you are helping. (over 12 times more infact) AND not even all of those only AD scaling champions will even build tri-force/iceborn, infact only 3 maybe 4 of them would 'maybe' build tri-force and i cant see any of them with ice-born as a regular item.. so thats maximum 4 champions in total that you have aided with this change.

Also ice-born tends to be used on tanks mostly, find me one 'true' tank that doesn't have an AP scaling..

So all other champs 
Shen, Kha'zix, GP, etc. etc. now have to suffer so that 4 champs (only one of which actually really uses sheen) don't have to feel bad about a wasted stat.

can we please bring AP back into tri-force/iceborn/sheen?
